Introduction
This topic contains information on general requirements for payment of benefits at the full-dollar rate based on U.S. residency, including information on obtaining
proof of U.S. residency
, and
evidence of
U.S. natural-born citizenship
naturalized citizenship
, and
permanent resident alien status
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 4, Section D - Awards and Payments for Benefits Due to Philippine Service
citation: Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 4, Section D
